articles.author: F1
articles.title: What To Watch For in the United States Grand Prix - Formula 1
articles.description: Chris Medland picks out five key things to keep an eye on when the lights go out on race day at the Circuit of The Americas.
articles.content: From Max Verstappen taking further points out of the McLarens to a first corner that seems to attract drama, and from Ferrari in the fight to repeat last years victory to track limit violations that … [+523 chars]
